description: Prototype that conforms to the magic-build spec. Implemented with Jenga.
name: rebel

scripts.extract-deps: ocamlfind ocamlc -pp refmt -linkpkg -package yojson -g -impl buildUtils/extractDeps.re -o buildUtils/extractDeps.out
scripts.extract-ocamlfind-deps: ocamlfind ocamlc -pp refmt -linkpkg -package yojson -g -impl buildUtils/extractOcamlfindDeps.re -o buildUtils/extractOcamlfindDeps.out
scripts.extract-backend: ocamlfind ocamlc -pp refmt -linkpkg -package yojson -g -impl buildUtils/extractBackend.re -o buildUtils/extractBackend.out
scripts.rebel-compat: ocamlfind ocamlc -pp refmt -linkpkg -package yojson -g -impl buildUtils/isDepRebelCompatible.re -o buildUtils/isDepRebelCompatible.out
scripts.rebel-to-ml: refmt -print ml -parse re rebel.re | sed 's/\[@explicit_arity \]//g' > rebel.ml
scripts.postinstall: eval $(dependencyEnv) && nopam && npm run extract-deps && npm run extract-ocamlfind-deps && npm run extract-backend && npm run rebel-compat && npm run rebel-to-ml
